Description: Great Union Sq location! 3 Bedroom near new Green Line - Avail 9/1 Enjoy all that Union Square has to offer with this well appointed 3 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom apartment, close to the new Green Line extension. It features nicely-sized bedrooms, a large living room, eat-in-kitchen, refurbished floors, granite countertops, garbage disposal, dishwasher and stainless appliances. Coin-op laundry in the basement. Parking may be available for rent. 3D walkthrough available. JUST WHAT YOU ARE LOOKING FOR Broker Fee applies one month's rent upon approval
